# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate.
- Examples: burner-mining-drill at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0), burner-inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5), burner-inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network.
- Example: steam-engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler have sufficient fuel to operate.
- Examples: offshore-pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Errors when using stone furnace
- Ensure that the stone furnace has sufficient ingredients to operate.
- Example: stone-furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined by the agent.
